title: Endocrine system. 2nd edition.
brief_description: Locates the major glands of the endocrine system and discusses the contribution of each to reproduction, growth, metabolism and the maintenance of homeostasis. Explains the regulatory mechanism of feedback as well as diabetes and goitre.
